title: Per-unit tax on monopoly shared with consumers

content.question: If the government imposes a per-unit tax on the output of a monopoly with a downward-sloping demand curve, the burden of the tax will be

choices.label: shared by the monopolist and the government
shared by consumers and the monopolist

content.answer: shared by consumers and the monopolist
